column4: how might i install X? im wanting to use conky im new in linux
do you have a GUI now?
how did you try to use it?
the conky site has decent documentation on configuring it
you aren't trying to compile conky are you?
yes, in the repositories.  Use synaptic
every time you want to install something, go to the repositories
there might be some info on help.ubuntu.com/community as well
I use .conkyrc so both may work
